markdownRemark.excerpt:
Copy project in  Create config nginx in  Symbolic link to sites-enable
 Create host in  Add  Check  Reload nginx
markdownRemark.html:
• Copy project in /var/www/html/project
  • Create config nginx in /etc/nginx/sites-available
  • Symbolic link to sites-enable sudo ln -s /etc/nginx/sites-available/project.test /etc/nginx/sites-enabled
  • Create host in /etc/hosts
  • Add 127.0.0.1 project.test
  • Check sudo nginx -t
  • Reload nginx sudo systemctl reload nginx
